snippet: America’s main pop-singles ranking responds to a surge in listening to music on the Internet.
abstract: Billboard magazine changes its methodology for ranking songs on the Hot 100 singles chart to account for online streaming of music.
lead_paragraph: America’s main pop-singles ranking responds to a surge in listening to music on the Internet.

headline.seo: Billboard Starts Counting Online Streams for Hot 100 Chart
headline.main: Billboard’s Hot 100 Singles Chart Starts Tracking Online Listening
headline.print_headline: Billboard’s Hot 100 Singles Chart Starts Tracking Online Listening
